description: The Event Notification History records notifications that were sent about a patient encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SENT_DTTM
columns.description: This date/time when the notification was sent.

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event notification event type category number for the notification delivery. This indicates the type of event that triggered event notification.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pending event or bed request that triggered Bed Planning Event Notification. Only notifications sent for Bed Planning events have a value populated for this column.

columns.name: SEND_TO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The send to category number for the notification delivery. This indicates who was supposed to receive the notification.

columns.name: PCP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the type of primary care provider for the notification delivery. Only rows that have a Send To of PCP have a value populated for this item. This column indicates the type of PCP that was supposed to receive the notification.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General

columns.name: SENT_TO_FAX_NUMBER
columns.description: This is the fax number that a faxed notification was sent to.

columns.name: SENT_TO_EMAIL_ADDR
columns.description: This is the email address that was used when a notification was delivered via email. There may be multiple email addresses listed.

columns.name: SEND_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The delivery method category number for the notification delivery.


May contain organization-specific values: No
